name: Recurse Robotics, Inc.
description:
The robotics lab is closed and locked up because of a pandemic, but you have an important document you left there. Fortunately, you have control of a robot inside the build. Guide the lab's robots to the front door to unlock it from the inside.

It's a block-pushing puzzle game like sokoban, with a few twists. You are only able to control the robot because it is near a transmitter, so you must keep a transmitter nearby, or the robot with go out of control (drive until it hits a wall). Also, robots are able to steer other robots, s

Made for the GMTK 2020 game jam. The theme was "Out of Control". I said on the jam page that the art and audio weren't original, but most of it actually was. There were just a few decorative assets I added, but the robots and props are all original.

If you get stuck, you can check out this full walkthrough guide I made: https://youtu.be/RKfYB0SH128
